name: Tomas Herceg
bio: Tomas Herceg lives in Prague, Czech Republic, and since 2011, he is running a software company called RIGANTI focused on custom software development, consulting and solution architecture services. He is a founder of DotVVM DotVVM, an open-source framework which simplifies creating line of business web applications and makes it easier for any .NET developer. He is Microsoft MVP for more than 10 years, and he also got the Microsoft Regional Director award. You can meet him at various tech events in the Czech Republic and other countries, speaking about web development, .NET, software architecture, cloud and related topics.
